con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://metro.edu/ics625/courses" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://metro.edu/ics625/courses" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://metro.edu/ics625/courses"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://metro.edu/ics625/courses" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--CourseType matches CourseEntity--> <xs:complexType name="courseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="number" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="offered" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--get all courses--> <xs:element name="getAllCoursesRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllCoursesResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="courses" type="tns:courseType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--get by ID--> <xs:element name="getCourseByIdRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getCourseByIdResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="course" type="tns:courseType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--get by number--> <xs:element name="getCourseByNumberRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="number" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getCourseByNumberResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--could be multiple with same number, so list--> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="courses" type="tns:courseType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--get by title--> <xs:element name="getCourseByTitleRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getCourseByTitleResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="courses" type="tns:courseType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--add new course--> <xs:element name="addCourseRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="course" type="tns:courseType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addCourseResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="saved" type="tns:courseType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--delete by ID--> <xs:element name="deleteCourseByIdRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteCourseByIdResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="deleted" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--update title + description--> <xs:element name="updateCourseRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="updateCourseResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="updated" type="tns:courseType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getCourseByTitleRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCourseByTitleRequest" name="getCourseByTitleRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addCourseResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:addCourseResponse" name="addCourseResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getAllCoursesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getAllCoursesRequest" name="getAllCoursesRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getAllCoursesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getAllCoursesResponse" name="getAllCoursesResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deleteCourseByIdResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:deleteCourseByIdResponse" name="deleteCourseByIdResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deleteCourseByIdRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:deleteCourseByIdRequest" name="deleteCourseByIdRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updateCourseResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:updateCourseResponse" name="updateCourseResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addCourseRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:addCourseRequest" name="addCourseRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCourseByTitleResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCourseByTitleResponse" name="getCourseByTitleResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updateCourseRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:updateCourseRequest" name="updateCourseRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCourseByIdResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCourseByIdResponse" name="getCourseByIdResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCourseByIdRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCourseByIdRequest" name="getCourseByIdRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCourseByNumberRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCourseByNumberRequest" name="getCourseByNumberRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCourseByNumberResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCourseByNumberResponse" name="getCourseByNumberResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CoursesPort"> <wsdl:operation name="getCourseByTitle"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getCourseByTitleRequest" name="getCourseByTitleRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getCourseByTitleResponse" name="getCourseByTitleResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addCourse"> <wsdl:input message="tns:addCourseRequest" name="addCourseRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:addCourseResponse" name="addCourseResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getAllCourses"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getAllCoursesRequest" name="getAllCoursesRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getAllCoursesResponse" name="getAllCoursesResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deleteCourseById"> <wsdl:input message="tns:deleteCourseByIdRequest" name="deleteCourseByIdRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:deleteCourseByIdResponse" name="deleteCourseByIdResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="updateCourse"> <wsdl:input message="tns:updateCourseRequest" name="updateCourseRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:updateCourseResponse" name="updateCourseResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getCourseById"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getCourseByIdRequest" name="getCourseByIdRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getCourseByIdResponse" name="getCourseByIdResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getCourseByNumber"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getCourseByNumberRequest" name="getCourseByNumberRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getCourseByNumberResponse" name="getCourseByNumberResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CoursesPortSoap11" type="tns:CoursesPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getCourseByTitle"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="getCourseByTitleRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getCourseByTitleResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addCourse"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="addCourseRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="addCourseResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getAllCourses"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="getAllCoursesRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getAllCoursesResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deleteCourseById"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="deleteCourseByIdRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="deleteCourseByIdResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="updateCourse"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="updateCourseRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="updateCourseResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getCourseById"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="getCourseByIdRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getCourseByIdResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getCourseByNumber"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="getCourseByNumberRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getCourseByNumberResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CoursesPortService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:CoursesPortSoap11" name="CoursesPortSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/ws"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
